content.en: Optimal distributed generation: Researchers have been using algorithms to determine the best placement and sizing of distributed generation units in distribution systems. These algorithms, such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) and Genetic Algorithm (GA), optimize the location and size of these units to minimize power losses, improve voltage regulation, and reduce costs. By using these algorithms, researchers are able to find the most efficient and effective ways to incorporate distributed generation into our electricity grids.
content.da: Optimal distribueret generation: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at bestemme den bedste placering og dimensionering af distribuerede produktionsenheder i distributionssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) og Genetic Algorithm (GA), optimerer placeringen og størrelsen af disse enheder for at minimere effekttab, forbedre spændingsregulering og reducere omkostninger. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer kan forskere finde de mest effektive og virkningsfulde måder at integrere distribueret generation i vores elnet.
